alert.note: Alert for Collier; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 3:14PM EDT until April 04 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Collier County in southwestern Florida... South central Hendry County in southern Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Hendry Correctional, or 17 miles southeast of Ave Maria, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Cypress National Preserve. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
